1.brief: to kneel; by implication to bless God (as an act of adoration), and (vice-versa) man (as a benefit); also (by euphemism) to curse (God or the king, as treason)
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
to be (causatively make) large (in various senses, as in body, mind, estate or honor, also in pride)
properly, vehemence, i.e. (with or without preposition) vehemently; by implication, wholly, speedily, etc. (often with other words as an intensive or superlative; especially when repeated)
grandeur (i.e. an imposing form and appearance)
properly, wrap around, i.e. (by implication) to put on agarment or clothe (oneself, or another), literally or figuratively

2.brief: to wrap, i.e. cover, veil, cloth, or roll
illumination or (concrete) luminary (in every sense, including lightning, happiness, etc.)
to stretch or spread out; by implication, to bend away (including moral deflection); used in a great variety of application
the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)

3.brief: to light upon (chiefly by accident); causatively, to bring about; specifically, to impose timbers (for roof or floor)
water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen
something lofty, i.e. a stair-way; also a second-story room (or even one on the roof); figuratively, the sky
to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
properly, an envelope, i.e. darkness (or density, 2 Chronicles 4:17); specifically, a (scud) cloud; also a copse
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
an edge or extremity; specifically (of a bird or army) a wing, (of a garment or bedclothing) a flap, (of the earth) a quarter, (of a building) a pinnacle

wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)

4.brief: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application
a messenger; specifically, of God, i.e. an angel (also a prophet, priest or teacher)

wind; by resemblance breath, i.e. a sensible (or even violent) exhalation; figuratively, life, anger, unsubstantiality; by extension, a region of the sky; by resemblance spirit, but only of a rational being (including its expression and functions)
to attend as a menial or worshipper; figuratively, to contribute to
properly, to lick, i.e. (by implication) to blaze

5.brief: to set (literally or figuratively); intensively, to found; reflexively, to sit down together, i.e. settle, consult
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
properly, a fixture, i.e. a basis; generally a place, especially as an abode
properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
to waver; by implication, to slip, shake, fall
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
properly, a (peremptory) terminus, i.e. (by implication) duration, in the sense of advance or perpetuity (substantially as a noun, either with or without a preposition)

6.brief: an abyss (as a surging mass of water), especially the deep (the main sea or the subterranean watersupply)
a garment (literally or figuratively); by implication (euphemistically) a wife
properly, to plump, i.e. fill up hollows; by implication, to cover (for clothing or secrecy)
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
water; figuratively, juice; by euphemism, urine, semen

7.brief: properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
to flit, i.e. vanish away (subside, escape; causatively, chase, impel, deliver)
properly, a part of; hence (prepositionally), from or out of in many senses
properly, to start up suddenly, i.e. (by implication) to hasten away, to fear

8.brief: to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)

to descend (literally, to go downwards; or conventionally to a lower region, as the shore, a boundary, the enemy, etc.; or figuratively, to fall); causatively, to bring down (in all the above applications)
properly, a split, i.e. a wide level valley between mountains
near, with or among; often in general, to
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that
to set (literally or figuratively); intensively, to found; reflexively, to sit down together, i.e. settle, consult

9.brief: properly, a cord (as twisted), i.e. (by implication) a boundary; by extension the territory inclosed
to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
to cross over; used very widely of any transition (literal or figurative; transitive, intransitive, intensive, causative); specifically, to cover (in copulation)
properly, a failure; by implication nothing; usually (adverb) not at all; also lest
to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
properly, to plump, i.e. fill up hollows; by implication, to cover (for clothing or secrecy)
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

a fountain (also collectively), figuratively, a source (of satisfaction)

a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)

to reside or permanently stay (literally or figuratively)

food (for man or beast), especially bread, or grain (for making it)

the earth (at large, or partitively a land)

the heart (as the most interior organ);
a man in general (singly or collectively)
to gleam, i.e. (figuratively) be cheerful; by transference to sound clear (of various animal or human expressions)

a tree (from its firmness); hence, wood (plural sticks)

a cedar tree (from the tenacity of its roots)
Lebanon, a mountain range in Palestine
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
properly, to strike in, i.e. fix; specifically, to plant (literally or figuratively)

17.brief: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
there (transferring to time) then; often thither, or thence
to nestle, i.e. build or occupy as anest
the kind (maternal) bird, i.e. a stork
a cypress (?) tree; hence, a lance or a musical instrument (as made of that wood)
a house (in the greatest variation of applications, especially family, etc.)

18.brief: a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
a craggy rock, literally or figuratively (a fortress)
a species of rockrabbit (from its hiding), i.e. probably the hyrax

19.brief: to do or make, in the broadest sense and widest application

properly, an appointment, i.e. a fixed time or season; specifically, a festival; conventionally ayear; by implication, an assembly (as convened for a definite purpose); technically the congregation; by extension, the place of meeting; also a signal (as appointed beforehand)
the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement

to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
an entrance (the place or the act); specifically sunset or the west; also (adverb with preposition) towards

20.brief: to place (in a very wide application)
the dark; hence (literally) darkness; figuratively, misery, destruction, death, ignorance, sorrow, wickedness
to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
properly, a twist (away of the light), i.e. night; figuratively, adversity
properly, to glide swiftly, i.e. to crawl or move with short steps; by analogy to swarm
properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
alive; hence, raw (flesh); fresh (plant, water, year), strong; also (as noun, especially in the feminine singular and masculine plural) life (or living thing), whether literally or figuratively
a copse of bushes; hence, a forest; hence, honey in the comb (as hived in trees)

21.brief: a village (as covered in by walls); also a young lion (perhaps as covered with a mane)
something torn, i.e. a fragment, e.g. a fresh leaf, prey, food
to search out (by any method, specifically in worship or prayer); by implication, to strive after
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)

the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
to gather for any purpose; hence, to receive, take away, i.e. remove (destroy, leave behind, put up, restore, etc.)
near, with or among; often in general, to

to crouch (on all four legs folded, like a recumbent animal); be implication, to recline, repose, brood, lurk, imbed

ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)

roomy, in any (or every) direction, literally or figuratively

adverb or preposition, with (i.e. in conjunction with), in varied applications; specifically, equally with; often with prepositional prefix (and then usually unrepresented in English)
great (in any sense); hence, older; also insolent

to walk (in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively)

to laugh (in pleasure or detraction); by implication, to play

near, with or among; often in general, to
